5001.11.2000Assistance at any operation under an item in
5001.11.2000group T8 identified by the word "Assist." for
5001.11.2000which the fee does not exceed $434.70 or at a
5001.11.2000series or combination of operations under items

5001.11.2000which the aggregate fee does not exceed $434.70
1051303   01.12.199100.00.00003  T9    SD
